sentences.cn: 他终于纠正了自己的错误说法，提出要减少费用。

sentences.en: He has climbed down on pledges to reduce capital gains tax.
sentences.cn: 他已经作出退让，许诺降低资本收益税。

sentences.cn: 英国如何能一下子减少其监狱服刑人数？

sentences.cn: 将这两个物种杂交后颜色会由红色淡化成橙色。

sentences.en: If the Europeans did not reduce subsidies, a trade war would ensue.
sentences.cn: 如果欧洲人不减少补贴，便会发生贸易战。

sentences.en: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.cn: 在白垩质土壤中添加有机物可降低其碱性。

sentences.en: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs.
sentences.cn: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。

sentences.en: People should eat less fat to reduce the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 人们应该减少脂肪摄入，以降低患心脏病的危险。

sentences.en: Protective gloves reduce the absorption of chemicals through the skin.
sentences.cn: 防护手套可以减少皮肤对化学物质的吸收。

sentences.en: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

sentences.en: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.

sentences.en: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.cn: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.en: The job losses will reduce the total workforce to 7,000.
sentences.cn: 职位减少后，在职工人总数将减至7,000人。

sentences.cn: 他们相信控制货币供应量会减少通货膨胀。

sentences.cn: 我们都需要寻求降低碳排放量的方法。

sentences.en: What may be done to reduce the influence of intractable opponents?
